description:
Features
- Compatible with Windows: LibUsb-Win32, WinUSB, libusb-1.0 windows backend
- Compatible with Linux: libusb-1.0
- Built-in Device Notifier (Arrival and Removal notification)
summary: .NET C# USB library for WinUSB, LibUsb-Win32, and libusb-1.0. Using the common device classes, applications work with all operating systems and drivers without modification. Lots of example code. Open source software at sourceforge.net.
author: Frederik Carlier,  Travis Robinson
